name: 12th International chemistry congress
content: 12th International chemistry congress Theme: Visualizing the Future Effects of Chemistry and Novel Drug Delivery Systems for diseases like COVID-19 Home | Conference Brochure | Submit Abstract | Scientific Sessions Conference series takes pleasure in inviting the scientific community across the globe to attend the 12th International chemistry congress during November 21-22, 2022 at Dubai, UAE with a motto to Evolution of clinical research in advanced life Euro chemistry 2022 focuses on the safety and effectiveness (efficacy) of medications, devices, diagnostic products and treatment regimens intended for human use. These may be used for prevention, treatment, diagnosis or for relieving symptoms of a disease. Previous Speakers: Haifei Zhang, The development of spheres-on-sphere silica particles for fast and efficient HPLC separation University of Liverpool, UK; Sergio Guazzotti, Ion chromatography solution for applied pharmaceutical markets, USA; Mladen Krajacic, University of Zagreb, Croatia; Monolithic chromatographic supports employed in virus separation and purification, Director Cardiac Anesthesia, USA; Fotios Tsopelas, National Technical University of Athens, Greece; Monika Šuleková, University of Veterinary Medicine and Pharmacy in Košice, Slovakia; Clydewyn M Anthony, The United States Pharmacopeial Convention (USP), USA; Piotr Wojciechowsk, Mossakowski Medical Research Centre, Polish Academy of Sciences, Poland; Sheila Leone, “G. d’Annunzio” University, Italy,; Maria Laura Zuccoli, National Institute on Drug Abuse, USA; Edith Bianchi, Pronat Medical, Israel; Fiorenza Rancan, Universitätsmedizin Berlin, Germany; Balint Sinko, Pion Inc., USA; Edith Bianchi, Pronat Medical, Israel; Ali Shahark, University of Sistan and Baluchestan, Iran; Yuichi Negishi, Tokyo University of Science, Japan. Euro chemistry 2022 Conference will encourage Young Researcher’s Forum, scientists and the researchers in their early stage of career graph to widely discuss their outcome so as to enrich and develop the idea. The ‘Best Poster Award’ is meant to encourage students in taking active part in the International Science platform to sharpen their skills and knowledgebase. The important tracks that are part of Euro chemistry 2022 Includes Pharmaceutical Chemistry, Advanced Organic & Inorganic Chemistry, Analytical Chemistry, Physical Chemistry, Theoretical Chemistry, Materials Chemistry, Applied Chemistry, Polymer Chemistry, Biochemistry, Computational Chemistry, Electro Chemistry, Radiochemistry & Nuclear Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, Biological Chemistry, Advanced Medicinal Chemistry, Chemical Biology, Green and Sustainable Chemistry, Chemistry in Clinical Research Euro chemistry 2022 is comprised of 22 tracks and 172 sessions designed to offer comprehensive sessions that address current issue. For more scientific sessions and abstract submission, please visit: https://europe.chemistryconferences.org/abstract-submission.php Grab the opportunity to participate by registering through flowing link: https://europe.chemistryconferences.org/registration.php For further details, please contact: Regards Laura Alex | Program Manager Euro Chemistry 2022 Direct: (702) 508-5200 Ext: 8028 Customer Service: +1 (800) 216 6499 E: worldchemistry@europeannualconference.com
